blocks.name: mulcncf
blocks.content: The multiplication of two continuous complex functions is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulcncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  cncfmpt2f(s0, c0, c1, cmul, c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmul, co(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), ctx, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  mulcn(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mulcncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×]c2))∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  cncfmpt2f(s0, c0, c1, cmul, c2, (TopOpen ` CCfld), w0)
  a1i(w0, × ∈(((TopOpen ` CCfld)[tX](TopOpen ` CCfld))[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  mulcn((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: divcncf
blocks.content: The quotient of two continuous complex functions is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm divcncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c0, ccncf, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), w0)
  divrecd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))
  cncff(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eldifsni(c2, cc, nat0)
  mulcncf(s0, c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c2), w0)
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, ccncf, cc), ccom(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  eqtr2d(cmpt(s0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), ccom(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, csb(hs0, c2, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  fmptcos(s0, hs0, cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c2, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, csb(hs0, c2, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, cdiv, c2), w0)
  eqtrd(csb(hs0, c2, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, cdiv, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, csb(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(csb(hs0, c2, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, cdiv, csb(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, cc))
  csbov2g(hs0, c2, cc, nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, csb(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(csb(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(c2, cc))
  eldifad(c2, cc, csn(nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c0, ccncf, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  cncff(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  csbvarg(hs0, c2, cc)
  cncfco(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), co(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), ccncf, cc)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  cdivcncf(hs0, nat1, cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cc, csn(nat0))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divcncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[÷]c2))∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c0[-cn->](ℂ \ { 0 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[÷]c2)), (c0[-cn->]ℂ), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×](1[÷]c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[÷]c2), (c1[×](1[÷]c2)), w0)
  divrecd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): c0 → ℂ), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c0[-cn->]ℂ))
  cncff((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, cc)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ≠ 0, c2 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  eldifsni(c2, cc, nat0)
  mulcncf(s0, c0, c1, (1[÷]c2), w0)
  eqeltrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(1[÷]c2)), (c0[-cn->]ℂ), ((hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0))∘(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), w0)
  eqtr2d((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(1[÷]c2)), ((hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0))∘(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦[c2 / hs0](1[÷]hs0)), w0)
  fmptcos(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, c2, (1[÷]hs0), (ℂ \ { 0 }), w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c2 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), w0)
  eqidd((hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, [c2 / hs0](1[÷]hs0), (1[÷]c2), w0)
  eqtrd([c2 / hs0](1[÷]hs0), (1[÷]c2), (1[÷][c2 / hs0]hs0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), [c2 / hs0](1[÷]hs0)=(1[÷][c2 / hs0]hs0), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  csbov2g(hs0, c2, cc, nat1, cdiv, hs0)
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, [c2 / hs0]hs0, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), [c2 / hs0]hs0 = c2, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  eldifad(c2, cc, { 0 }, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c2, (ℂ \ { 0 }), w0)
  syl(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2): c0 →(ℂ \ { 0 })), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c0[-cn->](ℂ \ { 0 })))
  cncff((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  csbvarg(hs0, c2, cc)
  cncfco((hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }), w0)
  mp1i(w0, (hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0))∈((ℂ \ { 0 })[-cn->]ℂ), 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  cdivcncf(hs0, nat1, (hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0)))
  eqid((hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })↦(1[÷]hs0)))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cc, { 0 })
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, hs0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
}
